bbValueDiff.description: New data with which we will compare content.

position.description: A position where differences will be added. Default value: 'before'

showArrow.description: Show arrow between old and new value Default value: false

sr-only-new.description: Text for screen reader to describe new value Default value: 'Current value:'

sr-only-old.description: Text for screen reader to describe old value Default value: 'Previous value:'
